channel.title: Looking for a programming partner! To create either RSPS, apps, or games
channel.description:
Hi! The name is [b]Aaron[/b]. I am [b]18[/b] years of age and am teaching myself Java Programming. Yes you can look at my rep and say I am a "noob" or a novice but actually I have been on moparscape for awhile almost 4 years. I haven't had much ambition to go out on forums and look for a partner to create a game or an app and maybe even make a little money while doing so. Well enough about me.. I would like to know about you and if you're interested. I am looking for someone who is dedicated and knows a little about programming. You don't have to be an expert because I am far from it. Java is the recommended language although others are just fine. [u][b]Please POST a short resume:[/b][/u]
Name:
Age:
Type of Programming Language:
Experience:
Email or type of contact reference:
Thank you for your time. Looking for many responses!! (:
Also [b]F.Y.I. [/b]I really want someone who won't back out and has some time of contact reference such as Skype/Facebook, etc. [b]Email[/b] me at [u][size=14pt]aaron.mier@gmail.com[/size][/u]

item.title: Looking for a programming partner! To create either RSPS, apps, or games
item.dc:creator: @ProgrammerAaron ProgrammerAaron
item.description:
@ProgrammerAaron wrote:

[quote=“smitman5110, post:3, topic:429856”]Name:Nathan Smith

Age: 15

Type of Programming Language: Java, VB .net, HTML, C++, Torque script. and I also do 3d modelling for games. im also making an rpg with unity game engine. I have a demo for it too which is online.

Experience: about 3 1/2 - 4years experience in most of this.

Email or type of contact reference: maverick90210@live.com but I prefer being contacted via skype: nathan.jdsmith you can also pm me on here.[/quote]

added looking forward to meeting you(:

Read full topic
